Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem ix die mensis
martij Anno Domini Millesimo quingentesimo primo

Eodem die Alexander hay concuictus fuit per assisam Juratam ex ore Willelmj
blinsele prelocutoris assise pro perturbio Johannis Duncanson' cuj emendabit
ut Jura volunt et Ideam Johannes quitus de omni perturbio prefati alexandri Justaret
de consensu et obligacione vtrusque partis obligate ad standum et subeundem
ordinacionem et consitucionem prepositi consilij et Assise tunc presentis decretum
et ordinatum fuit quod Idem Alexander Justaret preposito consiilo et Assise presentibus
ut supplicarent prefato Johanne ad Remittendum Rancorem animi et Actionem prefato
Alexandro pro delicto commisso quibus Instantem Remissum fuit eidem Alexandro et
eum ordinauit ad soluendum lumen Sancti sanguinis li'
cere immediate Et si in postum tale delictum commisseritandum Johanni aut
Cuicumque alteri soluet xl s' fabrice ecclesie siue Remissione ??

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
xiij die marcij quo supra

The saide day Jonhne of Knollis grantit him borghe to Jonhne
Arthour' for xxxvj s' In the nayme of the vicar' of Kynbethow the
quhilkis he grantit him to pay to the saide Jonhne Arthour at the
law day next eftir pasche to Cum

The saide day the balyes Assignit the law day nixt eftir pasche
to be haldin the ferde day of aprile nixt to Cum to the procuratouris of sere
Jonhne Ruthirfurde to ansuer to the borghe fundin one him be Johne
of leslie of Wardis and Annabell of gordon' his spous' for the wrang
uis haldin fra thame of four' li' xix s' and vij d' resauit be him
for the girssome of ane hald nethis fischingis of the Raik and nocht
allouit to tham et cetera Ande discernit the Copy of the saide borghe to the saide procuratouris

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' William
blinsele forspekar that Williame Walcar' sal resaue gilbert of
tulideffis claitht and putt it in the mylle and do his Craft tharto as efferis
at his pouer' Ande atour for the pece of the ende of the said
clath that is Split the saide William sal mak it als' gude
as the haill ende of the saide clatht to the said gilbert
and of alsmekill avalle

The saide day the aldirman and balyeis ordanit Williame
scrimgeour officiar' to pas' with sere Johnhe litstar chaplan
of Sanctis crispinj and crispiniam altar with the deknys of the
cordonaris and caus' him to be pait and content of his fee
of ale termes bigane eftir the tenor of his writis ande
documentis made to him tharupon aucht to him be the haill
craftismen of the cordonar craft within this burghe and to charge
thame tile obey thar deknys heruntill According to Justice

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem decimo
quarto die mensis marcij

The said day Williame Wricht in balheluy was in amerciament
of the court be his avne tong grant for the wrangwis' strub
lance of the towne and till amend as law will and forber In
tyme tocum

The said day William Wobstar grantit him to pay to Dauid prat
vij s' betuix this and friday quhilkis he was avand till him for his
Witsonday maile bigane and failyeing tharof that he pait nocht the
said vij s' be friday he suld pay the haile xiiij s' avand be
the said William to the said Dauid

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xviijo die
marcij Anno quo supra

The saide day mavnys Skippar of the feir' tuk to preiwe sufficientlie
one monunday that nixt cumis the xxj day of this Instant monetht
of merche befor the aldirman and balyeis that the pak of walde perte
ning to Jonhne Steuynsone that come hame in this last rays' in
his Schip tuk nay skatht in his defalt fra the tyme It was
put in his Schip quhile It was output of the siade Schip

The saide day Johne chamer oblist him be his handis vphaldin
to pay to Williame Rate tua barrellis of Salmond fule
Rede and Suet gude and Sufficient merchande gude of the Richt
uis' bynde of Abirdene at the fest of lammes next to cum
callit Aduinclam of Sanct Peter or viij dais obefor
or eftir for money pait to me Ande falyeing of salmond'
to pay him the hieast price that Salmond gevis thame
in Abirdene

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem vicesimo
primo die mensis martij Anno quo supra

add.foreign: deposiciones testimonium Inter mawnis skippar et Johannem stevinson

div.p:
The said day Williame Chamer deponit be his aithe that the pak
of wald pertening to Johne stevinsone was weit or It come In the schip
and It gat na skath' in the skipparis defalt bot gif It gat skatht be the
marchandis that lay on It

Johnn' Duncansoun' deponis be his aitht that or the said pak of wald
come out of the markat It gat Rane and wetit apone the hed of the bay
and It gat na skatht in the skipparis defalt and gif it gat ony
skath it was throue the heit of the lying of the marchandis

Alexander King deponis be his aitht that he saw part of wald
get weit liand one the hed of the berry bot he knawis nocht
gif it was Johne stevinsounis or nocht and he deponis that it
gat na skatht throue the skipper for quhy the schip was thicht

Alexander hay deponis that he had part of hemp liand apone the said wald
and thar come na wattir in the schip to do It skatht / he knawis nocht
gif it gat ony skath' throue the skipper bot gif it was throue heit
of thame that lay one It

Thome philp deponis that he saw the said wald dry pakit and It gat
part of snaw apone the hed of the berry and It get na skaitht throue
the skipper as he vndirstandis bot gif it gat ony skaith' throue the
marchandis that lay one It

hans how fleming deponis be his aitht that the said wald was weit
or It come in the schip and quhen he saw It strikin vp It was blew
and It gast gat na skatht in the skipparis defalt

Copin botisman concordis witht the said hans' deposicioun in ale
thingis

Clais' fleming deponis and concordis with the said hans' deposicioun'
in ale thingis

Hans freiss' deponis and concodris with the said hanss' deposicioun'
in ale thingis

The saide day the court wardit schew for law and It was
gevin for dome that mavnis Skippar of the Campueris hede
preuit Sufficientlie that the pay of walde pertening to Jonhne
Steuynsone that come hame in this last rays' on his schip tuk nay
skath in his defalt fra the tyme it was put in his schip quhill
It was Output of the saide Schip eftir the tenor of the act
maid' tharappon' Obefor' Ande the deposicionis of the witnes producit
tharuntill

Eodem die Willelmus cheshame fecit constituit creauit et nominauit
Patricium Rede suum legittimum verum et Indubitatem procuratorem Actorem factorem
et negociorum suorum gestorem et dandum et concedendum eidem suam presentem omni
modum ac mandatum speciale pro se et nomine suo ad petendum exigendum
et recipiendum a Willelmo Scherar' litstar naulum trium lastarum Cinerum
quod bona sua astricta pro bonis suis et naulo eorundem persol
ueruit et cetera Et de Receptis acquitandum et cetera Agendum prosequendum defendendum
promittens de Rato et grato In vberiore forma procuratorij Cum ceteris
clausulis necessaris et oportunis
The said day Johnne of mar' balyhe Chargit

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
vicesimo tercio die marcij anno quo supra

The saide day comperit Albert yansone gerardson' hollandar' mastir
vndir god of ane brokin Schip of Skedame quhilk
throw storne of sey happin' to brek and the wrak of hir'
come in one the cost of croudane in buchan quhilkis
wrak nethis saile takill and towis and ale Stuf being'
with the saide Schip as scho come to lande he grantit
he hede Sauld to ane nobile lorde William mastir
of Eroll for xv franche crovnis of golde quhilk he Resauit in
novmerit golde In the nayme of the saide lorde be the handis of Johne
chene of essilmonde and sere Johne baxtar Ande dischargit and quiet'
clamit the saide lorde his mene seruandis thar ayris executoris
and assignez Ande ale vthiris quhome It efferis for him his ayris
executouris and Assignez' ande ale vthiris quhome It efferis now and
foreuere with consent and Assent of Adriane clayss'sone Adriane Cornelson'
James meilsone Johne yansone and clayss' Williamsone and vthiris
marinaris and Schipmen being in the said Schip apone the quhilkis
Johne chene of essilmonde In the name of the sad lord askit Instrument
at me sere Johne Stirueling notar publicis vndir the Secret seil procurit tharto
be the saide albert before thir witnes Alexander menyes aldirman Johne Cullan
Androw Cullane Jonhne Wormet Johne mar' Dauid mar' balyeis Johne Steuinson'
Jonhne fechat burges of Abirdene geys' Okortsone Cornelius petersone et cetera

Jonhne of mar' Ane of the balyeis of Abirdene personaly constitut
The xxiij day of merche the yer' of gode jM vC and ane yer' In presence of thomas
leslie ane of the balyeis of Abirdene grantit him to haue set and Assignit Ande
be this present act settis and Assignis to Androw Cullane ale and hale his fischingis
of ane half nethis of the pott one the wattir of Dee with thar pertinence
for ane yer' nixt eftir the vigile of Sanctandrow Immediatelie folouing
to be Runnyn the said Androw his ayris or assignez payand the maile tharfor to
the aldirman and balyeis at the termes vsuale within the burghe' alanerly for certan
money resauit fra the saide Androw obefor' nochtwithstanding gif it happinis
the saide Johne his ayris or assignez to pay to the said Androw his ayris or' assignis
fyve merkis vsuale money of Scotlande and fyve hidis at mertymes nixt
hereftir thane the saide Johne his ayris or Assignez' sal haue fre Regres'
Agan to the said half nethis fischingis but ony Impediment fraude or gile
Jhon' off Mar
